channel.title: Yep it's another ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException error
channel.description:
Ok i load up my client and it comes up with this. I used the search tool [b]and[/b] google but none of the answers helped me as they were server related and not client.
Btw i'm using the Ninescape client. I think i got it through the tokkulscape or mezzyscape release.
[code]Liamscape 508 Client! java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at ItemDef.recolor(ItemDef.java:100) at Applet_Sub1.method18(Applet_Sub1.java:413) at Class44.method492(Class44.java:515) at client.method35(client.java:385) at client.method33(client.java:761) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:1125) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:157) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at ItemDef.recolor(ItemDef.java:100) at Applet_Sub1.method18(Applet_Sub1.java:545) at Class44.method492(Class44.java:515) at client.method35(client.java:385) at client.method33(client.java:761) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:1125) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:157) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at ItemDef.recolor(ItemDef.java:100) at Applet_Sub1.method18(Applet_Sub1.java:534) at Class44.method492(Class44.java:515) at client.method35(client.java:385) at client.method33(client.java:761) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:1125) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:157) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "8004b" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ModelLoader.loadArray(ModelLoader.java:37) at ModelLoader.<init>(ModelLoader.java:10) at Class1_Sub4.method115(Class1_Sub4.java:795) at Class116.method1715(Class116.java:726) at Class116.method1702(Class116.java:104) at Class68_Sub20_Sub17.method1181(Class68_Sub20_Sub17.java:291) at Class68_Sub8.method673(Class68_Sub8.java:96) at Class68_Sub7.method670(Class68_Sub7.java:120) at Class61.method598(Class61.java:442) at client.method33(client.java:767) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:1125) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:157) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
